message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be of great value to you. I'm thinking of a price around $14,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $12,000 is a significant drop from my initial offer.  How about we settle on $13,000? This feels like a fair compromise to me.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. How about we meet at $11,500? I'm willing to make a bit of a concession, but I'd like to get as close to my target as possible.

Bob, I'm seeing a pattern here, and I appreciate your directness. To be frank, $11,500 is cutting it a little too close to my bottom line.  How about we split the difference and call it a deal at $12,250?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable going above $12,000. How about we meet at $11,750? I'm willing to make another concession to get this deal done.
